transfer.description: Transfers a specified amount of tokens from the caller to a recipient.

transferFrom.description: Transfers a specified amount of tokens from one address to another on behalf of the owner.

constructor.description: Initializes the contract with the given minter address.

allowance.description: Returns the amount of tokens that a spender is allowed to spend on behalf of an owner.

approve.description: Sets the amount of tokens that a spender is allowed to spend on behalf of the caller.

balanceOf.description: Returns the token balance of the specified address.

cap.description: Returns the maximum supply of tokens.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimal places for token amounts.

decreaseAllowance.description: Decreases the amount of tokens that a spender is allowed to spend on behalf of the caller.

getRoleAdmin.description: Returns the admin role of the specified role.

grantRole.description: Grants a role to an account.

hasRole.description: Checks if an account has a specific role.

increaseAllowance.description: Increases the amount of tokens that a spender is allowed to spend on behalf of the caller.

mint.description: Mints a specified amount of new tokens and assigns them to an address.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

renounceRole.description: Renounces a role from an account.

revokeRole.description: Revokes a role from an account.

supportsInterface.description: Checks if the contract supports a specific interface.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.
